{"id":1564352110,"question_id":3786,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"8 months, 1 week","timestamp":1741226101,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1944 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1564352110/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Palindromic Subsequence After at Most K Operations","memory":"44.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int charDist(char a, char b) {\n        if (a > b) swap(a, b);\n        return min(b - a, a + 26 - b);\n    }\n\n    const static int mxV = 201;\n    int memo[mxV][mxV][mxV];\n\n    string str;\n    int dp(int l, int r, int k) {\n        if (r - l == 0)\n            return 1;\n        if (r - l < 0)\n            return 0;\n        if (memo[l][r][k] != -1)\n            return memo[l][r][k];\n\n        int t = 0;\n        if (k >= charDist(str[l], str[r])) \n            t = max(t, 2 + dp(l+1, r-1, k - charDist(str[l], str[r])));\n        t = max(t, dp(l+1, r, k));\n        t = max(t, dp(l, r-1, k));\n\n        return memo[l][r][k] = t;\n    }\n\n    int longestPalindromicSubsequence(string s, int k) {\n        str = s;\n        fill(&memo[0][0][0], &memo[0][0][0]+sizeof(memo)/sizeof(int), -1);\n        return dp(0, (int)s.size()-1, k);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-palindromic-subsequence-after-at-most-k-operations","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1037}
